error TS2552: Cannot find name 'Boolean'. Did you mean 'boolean'?
error TS2552: Cannot find name 'Number'. Did you mean 'number'?
error TS2552: Cannot find name 'Object'. Did you mean 'object'?
file1.ts(1,7): error TS2451: Cannot redeclare block-scoped variable 'var1'.
file2.ts(1,7): error TS2451: Cannot redeclare block-scoped variable 'var1'.

==== file1.ts (1 errors) ====
    const var1 = 0;
          ~~~~
!!! error TS2451: Cannot redeclare block-scoped variable 'var1'.
!!! related TS6203 file2.ts:1:7: 'var1' was also declared here.

    const var1 = 0;
          ~~~~
!!! error TS2451: Cannot redeclare block-scoped variable 'var1'.
